text: Aurelios Zopyros of Athens is the last reported athlete at the Ancient Olympic Games before the banning by Theodosius I in AD 393. He did junior boxing. His brother EukarpidÃªs was also an Olympic pankratiast winner in 381.Sport in the ancient world from A to Z By Mark Golden Page 24 (2004) == References == Category:Ancient sportspeople Category:Ancient Greeks
title: Aurelios Zopyros
